channel.title: Vital RS | PvP & PvM | Alot of more
channel.description:
Vital-RS Website: www.vitalrs.co.uk
Downloads: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4bihsx0a49r9h01/Vital-RS.jar (Dropbox) Vital-RS (Mediafire)
-All T90 Weapons -Full GWD -Many Bosses ( KBD, QBD, Nex and custom bosses such as Hope Devourer, Pest Queen etc! -Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Super Donator, Extreme Donator, Spawn and Support! -Server Statistics quest tab -Home is great! -Pvp System (kill streak, Hiscore) with Pvp shop - Ganodermic lair & Dragon lair! - Working Auras - Full Dagganoths with RS drops! - Flaming skulls - Specs for all items the should have - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP and a Repair stand! - Auras are all complete - 100% Godwars Bosses - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Fast Switching - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar) - All special attacks working - Awesome donator zone - FULL RUNESPAN - 90% WARRIORS GUILD - All new 742 armours with bonuses - Working Duel arena - Falconry Hunter - Gnome advanced
Images: https://gyazo.com/3120e8a0b2b9e38a282f547ecbec2b4f.png https://gyazo.com/745e8a43678fee84ababdacf11e92cec.png https://gyazo.com/1789a7ab646b9c8c06a723c3dbd8e522.png https://gyazo.com/442b2f210eed6a4b8b6510eb382935e7.png

item.description:
@jordyhacker wrote:

Vital-RS
Website:
www.vitalrs.co.uk

Downloads:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/4bihsx0a49r9h01/Vital-RS.jar (Dropbox)
Vital-RS (Mediafire)

-All T90 Weapons
-Full GWD
-Many Bosses ( KBD, QBD, Nex and custom bosses such as Hope Devourer, Pest Queen etc!
-Ranks: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Super Donator, Extreme Donator, Spawn and Support!
-Server Statistics quest tab
-Home is great!
-Pvp System (kill streak, Hiscore) with Pvp shop

  • Ganodermic lair & Dragon lair!
  • Working Auras
  • Full Dagganoths with RS drops!
  • Flaming skulls
  • Specs for all items the should have
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP and a Repair stand!
  • Auras are all complete
  • 100% Godwars Bosses
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Fast Switching
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
  • All special attacks working
  • Awesome donator zone
  • FULL RUNESPAN
  • 90% WARRIORS GUILD
  • All new 742 armours with bonuses
  • Working Duel arena
  • Falconry Hunter
  • Gnome advanced
